title: WTT my two T206 Tituses (Titi?) for an SGC 40 Titus
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: WTT my two T206 Tituses (Titi?) for an SGC 40 Titus
posts.post_content:
I have two raw Titus with different backs that I'd like to parlay into one in an SGC 40 slab.  Depending on appearance, I might be willing to do the straight 2 for 1 swap.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/raw-for-sale/7697/titus[/IMG][IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/raw-for-sale/7696/titus[/IMG]
